document_data.name: Mimré
document_data.deathnotes: Presumed dateHer corpse was not found until twenty years later.
document_data.mainbody: Lady '''Mimré''' of [[Procalith]] was one of the members of the [[Council of Lords and Ladies (Procalith)|Council of Lords and Ladies]] assembled from the mages of the city by the order of [[Sabral Faryre]] during his brief tenure as [[Magister]] in {{yearlink|298}}. After his dead body was discovered in the throne, she attempted to claim the mantle of the Magister by burning his body with a spell; she did not acquire the office. She went missing, as did the throne, that same night; her body was not found until twenty years later.
